course.subject: ISDN
course.name: Advanced Manufacturing
course.description: The special topic course introduces the advanced manufacturing and characterization skills in ISD, MDMF, MCPF, and NFF. This course includes fundamental theory and practical hands-on labs and projects for the student to acquire the basic knowledge on the advanced manufacturing skills, including laser engraving, transfer and cutting, CNC, waterjet cutting, UV and electron-beam lithography, dry etching, nanoimprint lithography, metal 3D printing, and stereolithography. The students will acquire the knowledge through lectures, and practical hands-on labs. The students will be fully prepared for their future hands-on research and entrepreneurship projects. Instructorâ€™s approval is required.
